column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I have many local libraries where I can borrow books for reading pleasure and reference without having to buy the books .
#id=2
#text=I first find my valid library card and visit my local library .
#id=3
#text=The library is quiet with many different types of people there .
#id=4
#text=It is relaxing place to just sit and browse through some books .
#id=5
#text=I ask the librarian for help in finding some travel books I wanted to borrow for my trip .
#id=6
#text=She is very helpful and directs me to the area where the travel books are .
#id=7
#text=I look through the shelves and find the books I need .
#id=8
#text=I check them out and borrow them with my library card .
#id=9
#text=I have a certain amount of time to return the books so I will make sure to return them on time in good condition so that I do not get fined .
#text=I leave the library satisfied with the books I borrowed .
